lines.text: How can she stand to be so close to her own body without constantly feeling herself up?
The name's Trigger, as in "horse," as in "hung like."
Well, well, well, who we have here?
We have... moi. Huh, me.
You know when I first saw you a moment ago, a shiver ran down through my body. Do you think you have something to warm me up?
You mean, like, hot chocolate?
I was thinking of something a little more personal and a lot more private.
Private as... as in... you and me?
Can't think of anyone else I'd like to invite.
Okay.
Okay?
Ahh, this place is full of nuns.
[to Ginnie]
Hello there. How ya doing? The name's Trigger, as in horse, as in "hung like".

[to Ginnie]
This is... my son's friend.
Oh.
Yeah. Me and him are inseparable. The age difference doesn't matter because we think like an adult, and we also do...
[Looks at Ginnie's cleavage]
other things like an adult.
I have to go. It's been charming to meet your son's friend.
Charmed's all mine.

[to Dr. Hammond]
I'll be seeing you.
Uh, sure. Anytime.
Any... time?
Sure.

[Finding out that Jack and Chris have switched places]
I do *not* fucking believe this!
